name: Super Mario on Scratch 4 Reboot - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 4 Reboot - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 4 Reboot that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/687735674/

Credits:

@MusicManJoe on Scratch for early playtesting

@griffpatch on Scratch for base collision code

@Brad-Games on Scratch for some of the tick code and feedback

@BILLGATESFAN on Scratch for helping the clone spawning code 

@NightCat28 on Scratch For Feedback

@Grayforz24682 on Scratch for Volume Slider Code and Enemy Listing Code

@BillyBot21 and @king8766 on Scratch for Semi-Solid Code

Special Thanks To:

@_meow-gobo_ on Scratch

@triangle5820 on Scratch

@xXNunyaXx on Scratch

@DuckGoose9254 for the Music Remixes

Nintendo for Mario and most of the other characters
